conversation.text: Given your preference for a future noir genre, Riki Lindhome as an actor, and English language movies, I'd recommend you consider watching "The Help". It is a powerful drama set in the 1960s civil rights movement, starring Ahna O'Reilly, Leslie Jordan, Aunjanue Ellis, among others. Another option could be 'Get Smart', a comedy spy film featuring Dwayne Johnson and Bill Murray, that might offer a lighter alternative. Enjoy your movie time!

shift_events.to_anchor: The Best Years of Our Lives
